intro: Randia hebecarpa, commonly known as the narrow-fruit randia, is a species of flowering plant native to tropical regions of the Americas. It belongs to the Rubiaceae family, which includes over 13,000 species of flowering plants. The plant is characterized by its small, yellowish flowers and elliptical, smooth leaves.
